    Meet the Team!

    VIP is a collaboration between students from Hochschule Hannover and Grand Valley State University. We are a diverse group of students working together to create something exciting and useful. We are Fabian, Cyril, Alex, Gizem, and Johannes.


    Fabian Volkert

      (email@domain.com)

    Cyril Casapao

      (casapaoc@mail.gvsu.edu)

    I'm a super-senior computer science student at Grand Valley State University. I'm originally from Yonkers, New York but I now live in Grand Rapids, Michigan. I enjoy studying and analyzing algorithms and producing readable documentation. I'm not very skilled with front-end design but I hope to get better with practice. Outside of programming, I like travelling, reading, and learning new musical instruments.
